text: <#CCQSQ2C6L|crankshaft> how come I can't see anything in the channel? Do I need to have a paid Slack account to do so?
The whole HubSpot account would have to be upgraded costing $6ish per user per month… This probably isn’t feesibly viable
Thanks <@UDJV5B73R> makes sense, although thought there would be some chat here? I was working on my own framework before I heard of this.  Instructions on using it are a little limited.
i say HubSpot should do it! :money_with_wings:
:smile: - I would pay myself to see past golden nuggets
3961 x $6pm - yeah they can afford it !
same here, but i doubt that that is possible

You’re correct that it would require a paid slack channel to make the history here available.

It is a known problem we really want to find a solution to. The pricing model for slack, doesn’t really make sense for how we’re using it in this workspace, and would be unpredictable costs wise. Even if paid, we’d run the problem of dormant user accounts racking up fees.

If you have questions Stu, ask away in here, many if not most of us who work on CrankShaft are in here
Thanks Jon, I'll get a set together after I'm done 'playing around' in my portal. Looks really promising, so congrats on work so far :+1:
Maybe not for here but... I'm on the hunt of the PDF slide deck for the presentation "From Simple to Mind-Blowing" Devday 2018
he probably picked up the dropbox and ran away with it. typical mclaren
no I didn’t steal them. I don’t think I owned the dropbox account that it was attached to(I’m not a big dropbox fan personally). Guessing <@U22PKFRU5> owned it
yep link was copy and pasted from <https://designers.HubSpot.com/blog/developer-day-2018-videos>
